document.masterDocTitle: The genus Colletes (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) in Central Asia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Colletes (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) in Central Asia

subSubSection.paragraph:
Colletes similis Schenck 1853
(nom. praeocc., nec Robertson 1904 , nec Jørgensen 1912 ): 172 , ♂ ( type locality: Germany ).
Colletes picistigma Thomson 1872 : 165
–166 ( type locality: South Sweden ).

Published records. Morawitz ( 1876 : 265 ); Popov ( 1967 : 15 ): Kyrgyzstan ; Noskiewicz ( 1936 : 308 ): Popov ( 1934 : 53 ): Kazakhstan ; Popov ( 1952 : 84 ): Turkmenistan ; Kuhlmann ( 2005 : 1374 ); Kuhlmann ( 2009 a: 17 ); Kuhlmann & Proshchalykin ( 2011 : 13 ); Proshchalykin & Kuhlmann ( 2012 : 20 ): Kazakhstan , Kyrgyzstan , Tajikistan , Turkmenistan .

General distribution. Ireland , Great Britain , Portugal , Spain , Norway , Sweden , Netherlands , Belgium , France , Denmark , Germany , Switzerland , Austria , Finland , Poland , Czech Republic , Hungary , Italy , Slovenia , Serbia , Macedonia , Bulgaria , Romania , Greece , Morocco , Algeria , Tunesia , Cyprus , Syria , Israel , Jordan , Ukraine , Russia , Turkey , Georgia , Armenia , Azerbaijan , Kazakhstan , * Uzbekistan , Kyrgyzstan , Turkmenistan , Tajikistan , Iran , China (Xinjiang).
